content:
This is progress, at last - meeting of @EMANews on December 21st instead only December 29th.

#vaccine #PfizerBioNTech #Corona
date: Quote TweetEU Medicines Agency@EMA_News · Dec 15, 2020 Update on assessment of the BioNTech and Pfizer BNT162b2 vaccine marketing authorisation application: https://ema.europa.eu/en/news/update-assessment-biontech-pfizer-bnt162b2-vaccine-marketing-authorisation-application…
